'''Gollum's Villainy''' is the fifth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' and the sixth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]].

== Synopsis ==
While [[Frodo]] and [[Sam]] sleep, [[Sméagol]] mutters in his sleep about killing them. He awakes and appears to be second-guessing his plan to lead them to ''her'', before [[Gollum]] reminds him they will be able to take the ring back for themselves. As Sam awakes, he hears Sméagol's plan to take the ring ''"once the Hobbitses are dead"''. In a rage, Sam attacks him. Frodo awakes and Sam tells him that Gollum means to murder them. Knowing they need a guide to get to [[Mordor]], Frodo refuses to send Gollum away. 

[[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King scenes|06]]
